text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: The world's a grand stage.

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: … As one, somewhere, hath proclaimed. Each soul must perform its part… thine company included?

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: Reciting the script as its plot unfolds, enacting the tale… Aye, following fate's decree. And the stage, it shall inevitably draw its curtain.

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: …… Hark! Methinks the hour draws nigh. Everyone, let us commence our tale ——

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: —— And thus, with hearts and bodies carried by angels, the two were bestowed with eternal life, and they lived happily in heaven.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …… What do you suppose, Gimlet? Isn't it a splendid tale?

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: … O' graceful spirit of shamrock. Indeed, the plot was brimming with intrigue, but alas, its conclusion didn't quite cater to my taste.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: In the land of Emerald, tales speak of many mysteries lurking. Within them, there must surely exist the essence to bestow upon me… the gift of inspiration!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Inspiration? Hmm… something that might pique Gimlet's interest… Ah, it's not exactly a tale, but…

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Halloween is approaching, is it not? Did you know it's believed to have its origins in the Irish festival of Samhain?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Samhain is a celebration that has been observed for over 2,000 years. It signifies the end of summer and was initially associated with the harvest.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: During Samhain, the boundary between our world and the Otherworld weakens, prompting people to don costumes for protection against mischievous spirits.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: … This world and the Otherworld. The deceased and the living… Spirits and humans… As Halloween ends, a "farewell" —

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: ……… Hehe……!! Hehehe…… Haha……… HAAAAHAHAHA――!!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Oh! Could it be that… I have given you inspiration?

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: Inspiration? No, it's a divine revelation! Fine… no, my Goddess of Creation.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: —— Would you like to create a world with me?

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: —— Hey, have you thought about our theme for this year yet? We should decide on it soon, shouldn't we?

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text: Oh, you're right! It'll be here in no time. ―― All Hooves'!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: (At Tracen Academy, a fan appreciation festival is held every spring and autumn. The autumn one is commonly nicknamed the "All Hooves'" festival, and it's akin to a cultural festival.)

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: (A large-scale event led by the students… In which case, being a student, I should have a role to play as well.)

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: It's pretty hard work, though. …If I suggested that we have a serious go at it, do you think everyone'd help out?

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Eek! Sh-She's staring at me…… Is she telling me not to be so dependent?! …I-I'll try my best～!

text_block_list.name: Classmate C
text_block_list.text: Haah… haah…! As you'd expect from a festival with such history… These past documents… they're so… heavy…!

text_block_list.name: Classmate C
text_block_list.text: Wha… um, well… I, uh… I'm sorry for being so weak～～～!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: (Perhaps, I might not have a role to play…… In this All Hooves' Festival……)

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: Fine… Do you need something from me?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Oh dear, you noticed me? Ahem, I've come to invite you, Kris! You see ——

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: That being said! I, Fine Motion, Gimlet —

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: — Shakur, Tap, and Kris are poised to grace the festival stage with our theatrical performance! Clap clap clap～!

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: Fyuuh! Awesome! What a darn tootin' fine group, I tell ya! This is gonna be a hootin' good time, Shakur!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Quit actin' all cozy. …And hey, what's with the intense stare-down, huh?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: —— How unexpected…… for you to be here.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Likewise.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: Mission — I've been chosen by Fine. So, I will follow… but.

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: I reckon, Kris, yer wonderin', "What kinda 'mission' does Shakur got?", am I right?

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: But ya see, her heart's way simpler than that. This gal's motivation always boils down to that "Highness"! Don't it?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: I told you not to get too cozy. My motivation is always data. D-A-T-A!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: I knew that, so I conducted my research and gathered data. She's an important friend, and I wished for her to be a part of it!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: The importance of experimenting with a variety of physical expressions, parallels between theatrical and racing settings, and so forth… I'm pleased I could be of assistance♪

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: Well, I'll be! Does that mean if I didn't put myself out there, you'd have tried to woo me too?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Of course! It's a splendid opportunity to create beautiful memories with all of you. I had a few heartfelt words prepared for you as well!

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: Well, that's a darn shame! But gatherin' with friends, and with Gimlet's script to boot, it's mighty temptin' to dive right on in!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: —— Gimlet… writing a script?

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: Listen up! Our theater troupe, "Fortuna's Ovation", is about to bring to life… Yes, a "farewell"! Presenting: "The Tragedy of a Certain Mechanical Doll"!
